document_data.name: Nuthkhal's Way
document_data.refs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220221195407/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Nov – Dec 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Nuthkhal's Way''' was a curved street that ran from the [[Eastway]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] to its southernmost city gate – the [[Cliffgate]].
document_data.Location: Nuthkhal's Way began just north of the [[Manycoins House]], passing to the west from it, curving south, crossing [[Stormshore Street]] and eventually reaching the Cliffgate.
document_data.Notable Locations:
*[[Eastway Expeditions]] on the crossing of [[Hammaskarl's Ride]] and Nuthkhal's Way, a shop that specialized in exploration equipment, particularly sold to adventurers ''en route'' to the [[Chultan Peninsula]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Manycoins House]], the office of the [[Merchant's League]] and a temple dedicated to [[Waukeen]].
*[[Garmult's House of Mastery]], a martial arts and combat skills academy and a social club in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Harborside Hospital]], in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the building was known as [[Scarbradro's Haven]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2008)/Manycoins House and Scarbradro's Haven}}{{Cite interactive atlas|3830 Baldur's Gate}}
